message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm asking for $22,000. I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob.  I understand your perspective on the market value. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $19,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product and the benefits it offers.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $19,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $14,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product.
